name: SpaceMove
description:
1 Game released by Atej_Studio as an early access.

SpaceMove is a strategy game based on predicting the movements of the enemy and other objects. 

The game's hero is a blue square that must reach the treasure marked with green color.  However, he must watch out for his enemy in the form of a red square, which will chase the hero. There are also so-called "teleports" that teleport the hero to a random location. 

The rules: 

collision with an enemy = (-120 points) 

collision with teleport = (-20 points) 

collision with treasure = (+100 points) 

0 points = lose 

1000 points = Victory  

PS. If you lose, the screen will show the time specially created that you survived.
